Arcadia-Solutions/arcadia

Self-hosted torrent tracker and site framework, built with Rust and Vue

View on index

Related repos

  • Web interface for managing multiple torrent instances
  • web UI for managing and monitoring multiple torrent clients
  • download manager for files, torrents, and videos with browser integration
  • automates TV show downloads and organizes episodes for usenet and bittorrent users
  • Self-hosted personal DevOps platform
  • Self-hosted file server with a Svelte frontend
  • Crystal web framework for building web apps and APIs
  • web hosting control panel with OpenLiteSpeed, auto SSL, backups, Docker, AI security, and easy PHP management
  • Marketplace for installing Kubernetes apps and CLIs
